content.title: Kachara Binane Vaale Hetu Suraksha Upakaran Sahaayata Yojana
content.details: Labor Department of Chhattisgarh State started this scheme 'Kachara Beenane Vaale Hetu Suraksha Upakaran Sahaayata Yojana' for unorganized worker on 19 June 2017. The main objective of the scheme to empower unorganized worker by providing safety equipment.
benefits: A cash assistance in the amount determined by the CSID.
eligibility: Applicant must be a registered waste picker in Chhattisgarh State.
Applicant must not be receiving assistance from any other parallel scheme of the state government.
Applicant must be between 18 and 60 years old.

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme 'Kachara Beenane Vaale Hetu Suraksha Upakaran Sahaayata Yojana' for unorganized worker on 19 June 2017.

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The main objective of the scheme to empower unorganized worker by providing safety equipment.

faqs.question: What are the benefits?
faqs.answer: Gloves, Shoes and Rain Coat (OR) A cash assistance in the amount determined by the CSID.

faqs.question: Who can get the benefits?
faqs.answer: All eligible unorganized worker from Chhattisgarh State.

faqs.question: What is the required age to get the benefits?
faqs.answer: Applicant must be between 18 and 60 years old.

faqs.question: Can applicant get the benefits multiple times?
faqs.answer: No, benefits will be provided only at once.

faqs.question: What is the procedure to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicant must be registered under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Only then applicant can apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: How can applicant register under Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board?
faqs.answer: All the applicant have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department. On the home page click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Enter the following details, Select Group Name: 'Asangathit Marmakaar Mandal' Select Service: 'Asangathit Shramik Panjikaran' What do you want to do: 'Aavedan' Click next. Check the eligibility criteria for registration in Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board and click next. Fill out the online 'Registration form'. Submit.

faqs.question: How to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: All the applicant have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department. On the home page click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Provide the required details. Fill out the application form. Submit.
